The world is made for children
 With sparklin' eyes and silly smiles
 Ain't it funny how all we grown-ups
 Have just tried to many styles
 
 Children sing and they laugh and play
 We make war over yesterday
 In both games it's come what may
 But children don't have to die
 
 The world is made for children
 With eager eyes and truthful smiles
 Ain't it funny how all their broken dreams
 Have just been too many miles
 
 c1980, 2007
